ValidationRule.description: Sales Rep Needs Analysis Received is a required field when "Current Step" field is (2 of 12) or greater
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'(1 of 12) Sales Rep Conducting Needs Analysis')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'Onboarding Complete')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,'')), ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Needs_Analysis_Received__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sales Rep Needs Analysis Received is a required field when "Current Step" field is (2 of 12) or greater
